name: Yakuzakura
description:
An old oriental legend narrates:
«An invisible red thread connects those who are destined to be together, regardless of time, place or circumstances. The thread can be stretched or contracted, but never broken».
...

This was what happened to Harinezumi and Arumajiro, the chief’s daughter of the 
Japanese mafia Yakuza and a subordinate. Now they must escape to stay alive, which will not be exactly easy being linked by a red thread ...

Help them on this little adventure: explore two different beautiful levels, defeat enemies, collect points destroying different objects and escape! 

All the levels are procedurally generated, it

will be different each time you play!

Play solo or  local multiplayer.

Especially made for #GamePXJam:

Topic: mythology

CONTROLS:

  • 1 player: SPACE BAR
  • 2 players: A + L

A  game by:

  • Rocket_raw   (Julia Cajigal)    @rocket_raw
  • Naburo   ( Raúl Arenas)    @Naburo_rae
